text: The Cranes Are Flying (, translit. Letyat zhuravli) is a 1957 Russian World War II romantic drama movie directed by Mikhail Kalatozov and starring Aleksey Batalov, Tatiana Samoilova, Nikolay Smorchkov, Vasili Merkuryev, Svetlana Kharitonova, Valentin Zubkov. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 war movies Category:1957 romantic drama movies Category:Russian romance movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian war movies Category:World War II movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Kalatozov
title: The Cranes Are Flying
